|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI M3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/14/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Banana_Pi_BPI_M3 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A83T; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 4.5 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 672MHz |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = MTech;AWL3A1632; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot; |stockos = Linux;
|exp_if_types = SATA 2.0, USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), MicroSD Card slot, HDMI 1.4 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, MicroSD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Audio out (3.5 mm), Microphone, IR Receiver, UART, SPI, I2C, PWM |addchip = USB 2.0 to SATA Bridge Controller;Genesys Logic;GL830;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, PMIC & Audio Codec;X-Powers Limited;AXP813;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 5.1, Ubuntu, Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian, FreeBSD, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2015 |estprice = 88 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIARK0JEB7332 |asin = B0BFRF3696 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A83T :SoC: Octa-core (Cortex-A7) @1.6GHz *GPU: PowerVR SGX544MP2, OpenGL ES 2.0, H.264/4K *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 4.5) Flash, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC Card slot, :SATA 2.0 (via USB-to-SATA bridge) *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR3) RAM @672MHz *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK AP6212]] :802.11bgn (2.4), BT 4.0 *Network: 1x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M3 ''Banana Pi BPI-M3'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Sinovoip_Banana_Pi_M3 ''Sinovoip Banana Pi M3'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi#Banana_Pi_BPI-M3 ''Banana Pi BPI-M3'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/07/09/banana-pi-bpi-m3-development-board-features-allwinner-a83t-octa-core-processor/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M3 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
